markdownRemark.html:
Software engineer, drummer, basketball nerd, backpacker and hiker, Oakland native.

I’m currently a Senior Software Engineer at Samsara, a fleet management and industrial IoT company based in San Francisco.

Before returning to the Bay Area, I previously did stints in Connecticut, New York City, and most recently Detroit.

Previous escapades:

  • Software development at Waymark.
  • 2015 Venture for America Fellow.
  • Civic sector management consulting at Bennett Midland.
  • Math and music at Wesleyan University in Middletown, CT.
